title: 1st floor of house. Heat & Hot Water & WiFi. Back Yard
posting_body: ['Sunny one bedroom apartment on the entire first floor of a two family house.', 'Private back entrance.', 'Windows on all 4 sides.', '- Heat, Hot Water and high speed WiFi included.', '- Eat-in kitchen', '- Large living room', '- Large bedroom', '- Updated bath', '- Hard wood floors', '- Quiet location at the end of a cul-de-sac', '- Small yard for BBQ', '- 5 min walk to St. Elizabeth Hospital and Brighton Center', '- 10 min walk to Allston Union square', '- 10 Min Walk to Green Line on Commonwealth ave.', '- Less than 5 minute walk to #57 bus to BU, Kenmore Square and Watertown Square', '- 5 minute walk to #64 bus to Central Square and Kendall Square', '- 5 minute walk to #86 bus to Cleveland circle and Harvard Square and Harvard Business School', '- 10 minute walk to Stop & Shop', '- 5 minute walk to the new Boston Landing along with New Balance building and WBGH building', '- Plenty of on street parking', '- Available late August', "- Only Requires first month and last month's rent.", 'No security deposit.', 'No fees.', '- Flexible lease term', '- Must have good credit', '- No pets', '- No smoking']
